product_name: Salomon Siam 7 Pilot CF Cross-Country Boots - Women's
long_description: The women-specific Salomon Siam 7 Pilot CF cross-country ski boots deliver excellent performance and a personalized fit, taking your touring to the next level. SNS(R) Pilot(R)2 Touring outsole features 2 connection points with the SNS Pilot classic binding (sold separately) for excellent stability and control while skiing. Women-specific fit features a narrower heel and lower instep volume than the men's boots; boot is lined with fleece and faux fur for excellent comfort. Soft comfort foam placed next to the foot is backed by thermo-formable foam for a precise fit that molds to your foot as you use the boot. Low-bulk Thinsulate(TM) insulation offers excellent thermal properties and is water resistant. Rip-and-stick ankle strap lets you adjust cuff tension for desired support. Salomon Quicklace Kevlar(R) laces pull snug with a single tug. Lace cover with diagonal zipper keeps snow and ice out.
short_description: The women-specific Salomon Siam 7 Pilot CF cross-country ski boots deliver excellent performance and a personalized fit, taking your touring to the next level.
